The strong writing and good performances keeps the show interesting but the plots are starting to feel like something pulled from a soap opera.
Not much to say... Except I love this series and have enjoyed it immensely!  I'm Looking forward to watching more!!!!!!

always entertaining and exciting without all the unwanted foul language and trashy sex scenes of the normal TV shows! Downton Abbey always leaves you in anticipation for the next episode, can't wait for the next season!

Where do I begin?  I absolutely love this series.  I love the period clothing as well as the social upheaval of the times.  The characters are outstandingly played - you begin to feel like you actually know them.  Well done Masterpiece Theatre - well done!
I can't wait for season 5 to begin. Have bought all 4 and loved every minute. The show was captivating and entwined. I love that period of time, wish I lived then.
This item was a gift for someone who was not able to see the show on TV.  It is a lovely series and she was so thankful for the DVDs
Great Program
This series is an engaging soap opera that deal with social changes that occurred around the time of WW I.  The set and the costumes are superb; the acting is excellent.
Plays as it should ... a great show... a great commercial free way to watch the show... my wife is happy

I would rate the other 3 series a 5 star.. This 4th series was good but lacked a little depth. It was slower than the others in story line and dragged along at times. Not much happened in this one, but liked the way they tied up all loose ends..Still was worth watching..
Acting is superb, every detail looks so authentic. cannot fault it. Hopefully the series will continue for a long time
What can I say, its perfection. :)  The blu-ray edition makes it possible to really appreciate the incredible wardrobes and surroundings.
As a fan of Downton Abbey anyway, Season 4 did not disappoint. I was concerned that the U.K. edition might not play here in the US, but I've had no problems whatsoever.
I thought I bought the season but guess not. I love Down ton abbey. Hope there are more episodes. I only saw 9 of season4
I need to watch a whole season at a time.  Love the story.  Can't wait for next season.  A nice collection to share with friends.
Loved seeing this new season and can't wait to get the next one. I would love seeing even more behind the scenes.
We love this show and the Blue Rays are excellent for quality and they also contain extra  material which is always very interesting. Highly recommend the whole series.

This series is a delightful look at the past aristocracy in the UK.
It proves everyone, no matter their station in life, have stress and issues affecting their happiness, financial well being and family relationships. It is a continuing saga well played by the actors. Enjoyable.

My wife fell in love with Downtown Abbey, which doesn't happen often because our tastes are very different. This show is extremely well made, actors are superb and the story line keeps you engaged and wanting more. I hope they make Season 5.
Loved it!!!!!!!!!! Edith, poor Edith. She definitely needs cheering up maybe she'll get that in the next season. I miss Matthew !!!!!
I watched this series faithfully every evening on a friends recommendation. Loved the content and the scenes of highclere castle. Masterpiece theatre is wonderful.
I am a fan of Downton Abbey. I have watched the eposide over and over. I just love the characters.
Great show! I watched it from the start with Prime streaming. Great characters and interesting story. I can't wait to see what else happens!

Life moves on as hard as it seems at times.

Grand Mama is wittier than ever, would love to meet her in person.
Also, compelling characters and very interesting information on the nature of the class system and how it changed in England around and after the first world war.
Season 4 is very interesting. Its a good watch. If you're a downton fan, its a must buy and watch.
I hate that the show is without Matthew. Other than that, it's awesome. I enjoy watching with my family as it is generally a family safe show.
When nothing on TV seems worth watching, an evening with Downton Abbey is a story with history,class, information. Totally engaging.

The problem with this Series is, as it progresses, it gets more like a long running soap.
Edith needs to be given some encouragement re suitors.  Surely her father with all his aristocratic contacts could find her someone other than a journalist?  She would have had to be given some sort of Dowery
Lady Mary never lacks suitors.
The horrible Footman gets worse and worse.  How much longer before he's found out?
Next series, hopefully will be the last, despite the superb costuming and the wonderful Dowager Grandmother - Maggie?
This is officially one of my favorite shows!  Season 1-3 are great as well! I cant wait to see the next season!

Love the quality of acting as well as the photography and the story.  The twists and turns kept us guessing.  We found ourselves discussing the likes and dislikes of the story regularly.  Can't wait for Season 5.
The only negative to Downton Abbey is that the season doesn't last long..not enough episodes in a season.  Other than that, what a fantastic show. I feel like I am part of that era when I watch it.
I love everything about Downton Abbey and Season 4 is the best so far.  Acting is incredible.  Story is fabulous.  Can't wait for season 5.

This a great series. I have seen all four seasons. All of the characters are very interesting and well developed. If you like period pieces, this is a must see. The only negative is the number of episodes in this season (9). Most series on cable are at least 12. Waiting until next season is irritating.
This show (and these characters) gets under the skin!  I'm in love with this Universe and dearly miss it between seasons!  Superb production, acting, directing, writing -- just superb in every way!!

Excellent plot development with multilayers sustains interest throughout each show.  Enjoy the acting.  I do miss Matthew & feel the marriage did not have time to mature.  Intriguing mysteries with Bates, Narrows and Edith's love interest!

We were unable to watch/record some of the season 4 episodes, & even missed a few things in the ones we did watch, so the DVDs hit the mark for us.  On the negative side...two of the discs were were damaged, resulting in poor picture quality in one instance.  The disc damage was so bad on one of the episodes, that we were unable to watch it!  Unfortunate, as that was one of the episodes that we had not previously watched to conclusion.

I stopped watching TV years ago because it became nothing but garbage. I heard a lot of praise about this show so I took a chance and bought the DVD's. I'm so glad I did. I never would have thought that there could be a TV show without sex, violence and disgusting jokes, let alone a story worth watching.  This is such a  wonderful and interesting story I would give it 10 stars if I could.
I was disappointed in the 4th season - but, like life, things are never the same from one year to the next.  Still great enough to add to one's collection.

This season was another great ride. Love the characters in the story and Maggie Smith's character is absolutely amazing as the family matron with her one liners and wisdom, great fun.  The plot twists were interesting and episode 4 was a shocker that was dealt with sensitivity and realism.
Can't wait for season 5!!!
This is a great series. Thanks for making it available. It is not available on some of the other services
I found season 4 of Dowsnton Abbey to be great.  Anyone who knows the show knows that it is a compeling season
Always a great way to pass the afternoon. Love the acting and the drama of this program. The story line keeps you tuning back in.

Julian Fellowes is running out of steam I'm afraid, and I'd have preferred his narrative if he'd stopped at the end of Series 3 and not killed off Matthew.  Production values as always are top notch, but at times the storyline was just silly and unlikely. Poor  Anna is perpetually angst-ridden,  the sinister .scheming  footman is almost a joke, and Edith would be the unluckiest woman alive. Ending series 4  with Edith's lover disappeared in Germany was a real cop-out, and an obvious link to be continued in Series 5.
 Pity, because the first three series were great.
Looking at my 'suggested' titles on Instant, it's full of all the Romantic/Victorian/Period Series/Mini-Series/Movies I've watched and enjoyed. Downton beats them all.
13 Million viewers, the number 1 show for Masterpiece Theater, what more can I add?  I can't wait for the next season to be released.  Have re-watched many of the episodes while waiting for new ones.
I love Downton Abbey! It is one of the classiest shows on television! When I want to see modest people with class I watch this show. I wish all people were as modest.
I love this series, and the DVD's arrived in a timely manner. Thank you so much. I'm looking forward to the next season.
This is the best production that I have ever seen.  Words just cannot describe how good this is.  I cannot remember when I have enjoyed anything so much!
e the story. Love the characters' most of them.  Love the wardrobe.  Can't wait for season 5. Excellent movie.  Well done.
have loeved this show since it began  it has fallen off a bit but still lots of fun awaiting new season
I so love Downton Abbey.  It is such an enjoyable changed from all the blood and violence on the tube these days.
The price was the best around and needed it to complete my series collection.  I can't believe I have to wait for Season 5!

I am not normally a fan of serials or soap operas, but I loved Downton Abbey. Have seen all the Seasons. Did not like this one as much as the first three, but it was good. The acting is very good, and you really get to know and understand the characters. Keeps you guessing what will happen next. Anxiously waiting for Season 5.
I was disappointed that it was so short this season, hopefully next season will be longer.  Love the show anyway.
What more can be said.. Only complaint is that the season is way to short... Every season, we haven't wanted it to end....More, More, more..

I had just starting watching Downton Abbey a couple of weeks ago because we decided to cancel our cable; with Amazon Prime, you can view some of the episodes at no cost (right now anyway). After the first episode of the first season, I was hooked. I watched all four seasons already and cannot wait til January to watch what happens next in season 5!  I love all of the characters especially the complex Mary, Lord Gratham, and the others. Great writing and terrific acting!

I received Season 4 at a good price and in a timely manner.  I enjoy watching it and find the picture good.
Thank you so much.
I love Downton Abbey and was so excited that I could get this quickly after the season ended. I can relive all 4 seasons now thanks to Amazon!
Have not had a chance to watch it yet but based on previous seasons I am looking forward to season 5.

I wish there were some outtakes, and deleted scenes. In US there are other scenes, maybe cut for time.  PBS there are no commercials so I do not see why the deleted scenes cannot be included.

I do wish PBS would show this when I TV does.  In a global world there is no reason why it cannot!
It was great! my sister-in-law has it now and will not give it back!  plan on see in the next season soon I hope?

I love this series and so glad I discovered it on amazon prime. The characters are well developed and curious. I am intrigued by the plots that develop out of this household. O'brien was quite a character and sorry to see her go but she might be back. I could choke Thomas who is just a miserable person. Loved Matthew and Sybil and cried when they left. His lordship is quite a character as well and cannot manage finances at all. Waiting impatiently for season 5. Hope this series continues for a long while. Love it.
One of the best series that has been produced!  We enjoyed it very much and can't wait fro the Fifth series to become available.
Outstanding series about a titled family in Britain from about 1912 to the 20's. Wonderful acting, super scenery; just the best there is.
It seems like it will forever until Season 5, after waiting forever for Season 4. Paul Giamati is a welcome addition.
Never got started watching Downton Abbey on TV, but when I finally saw a part of it, I got hooked, and ended up getting all 4 seasons.  I love stories from this era.
Love, love this series.  The cast is great (Maggie Smith is hilarious) and the story line is even greater.  I am totally hooked.
just love the show and the characters.  good plots and great scenes could not ask for more in a show
Birds eye view of the period with accurate clothing, furniture, events and mores. Thank goodness benevolent household dictatorship has gone!
My sister loves this series.  A great series about aristocratic life in Great Britain.  It has been broadcast on television quite a bit.

All I can say is AMAZING!  I hope they will continue...I am so hooked on he story lines and the characters. Well done series.
Thank you!
This series has been entertaining.  Love the characters, even the ones I don't care for :).  Looking forward to next season.
I love downton abbey I watch it while working on my treadmill a very good show. cant wait for next season
If you enjoyed seasons 1-3, you'll enjoy this season as well, just as my family does.  Eagerly awaiting the release of Season 5.
Just another in the many British series that is  very entertaining. To bad we have to watch them on PBS and they are edited to fit the time slot.
excellent production I love historically based productions and this was exceptionally done- the cinematography, dress design, and the acting were superb!
the  thing that my wife and i enjoy the most is the writing; it's  not  only excited but it is clean and wholesome which is so  hard to find in todays world

I got this before all the episodes aired locally and I couldn't wait.  I watched the episodes before they came on TV, then went back to the beginning and watched all of them..... what can one say about Downton Abbey?  It's addictive.  Was very pleased with this season.
Great show. Love catching up with Amazon prime.  I intend to watch more shows in the future.  Thanks for a great service.
I am a big Downtown Abbey fan.  Don't really like season four since it is on the dark side. But such a fan I have to have the whole set.

I mean, c'mon! It's just a great series, and if you were a fan of the past seasons you'll love this one as well. I personally don't think it's as up and down as Season 3 (S3 practically ruined my life for a few weeks after that finale), but the drama we love isn't missing for a moment. I very much suggest giving this title a go!
I am eagerly awaiting Season 5 but I don't think well see it until Fall 2014. Dont miss this one.
Love the series and the DVDs!! Price and timely manner of shipping is a plus! Would recommend to anyone that enjoys a really good series the whole family can watch.
Can't wait until Season 5 arrives next year.  What a great BBC soap opera!  Keeps me coming back for more.  I am depressed when it ends.  Highly recommend it.
It just seems like whoever's writing Downton (is it still Julian Fellowes??) is running out of ideas.  I'll still watch the next season, hope it improves.

This is an excellent program!  I love every character, all of the plotting and scheming. The only thing I do not like about it, it only has 8 episodes and after that we have to wait a year for it to come back on. I love this show!
The characters on Downton Abbey are like family.  I really adore them.  Keep going, please.  I do miss Matthew, however.
I am not quite finished with watching the entire Season 4 of this yet, but am wanting to watch every free moment I can get.

What can I say that everyone hasn't already said?  Great series, great acting, great sets, great clothes, great hair, GREAT STORY!!!  I am so glad this series has been available on blu-ray, so I could order it at home and watch it over and over again, if I want!  :))
excellent-no problems with the discs or anything. Nice clear picture that I would recommend to anyone-thank you for the business
Love Hugh Bonneville's character.  I just wonder what kind of issues he will get into this season.  I can imagine they could take a turn for the worse.
An amazingly produce, written, directed and acted series. I hope it continues. It is entertaining, educational, suspenseful and beautiful. A FANTASTIC break from violence and chaos of many shows.
At last a series that my husband and I look forward to watching together.  There's never a dull moment with love, war, death, birth, scandal.you name it!
Love this series!! I'm addicted. I wished there had been more episodes though--it was a bit too short for my liking.

Just great ...cannot get enough of it.  Started Season 1 on my laptop while on vacation and finished 1, 2 and 3.  What a great way to spend an evening .... very relaxing but all the twists keep me on my toes.
I want to live there I love this show. Going through the changing times with Mary is great. I love the era
Love, love , love this series. could hardly wait to join them again. Now to wait til season 5. xx
DA continues its tradition of well-written scripts brought to the screen with superb acting in beautiful locations.  What's not to love?

How can you not rate 5 stars to such a beloved series, especially this one.  As a basic romantic, heartache and happiness can be felt almost every minute in this season 4.  It drawn us into our current dreams through the back door of memories.  To see hope born and reborn takes us to the secure places in our minds.  To witness the birth of love between two kind people---one who thought love had passed him by forever and one who never imagined she'd ever be anything more than the magnet to draw wealth back into a family that was withering in the garden of an aristocrat whose title was more valuable than his own family.  As always, and often better, our DVD copy of Downton Abbey Season 4 will on the others in our "what makes a family" collection of British productions.
Masterpiece is a such a treasure and this series DOES NOT DISAPPOINT!!!!!! Masterfully written and gorgeously executed program, bravo PBS!
I have only watch episode 1 so far. I like the transition. Good for Lady Mary to stand up to her father and do the right thing in Matthews memory!

As in seasons past, the shows saving grace can be found in it's great production values. Season 4 had a somewhat more shallow story line. The entire season was much more soap opera like. Over all 3 stars is a generous rating.

I so loved the first and second season, I have purchased them all. Season 3 was a big disappointment, but I had bought it before I knew how bad it was. Season 4 had some very disappointing parts, but was better than season 3, the ending was hopeful. I miss all the wit, charm and romance of the first two seasons. I hope they haven't run out of ideas and had to go the American soap opera route, British humor and the draw of the rich time has me hoping for next season.
I loved every minute of it, it was well done, good actors and quite intriguing. I am ready for some more of it.  Thanks.

I watched this season in two days!  I am only sorry that I did because Season 5 won't air until this winter.  It is such a wonderful series and I am amazed at how well written it is.  I can not wait to see what happens.
Wer'e hooked. Best acting and story line we have seen in years. Hoping for many more series in years to come.
Good season. I watched them all to quick! Let's see does anyone know when season 4 comes out? Can't wait!
A HUGE fan..we watched from the beginning...can't wait for season 5!!!!! absolutely the best series on TV.. where is Mrs. O'Brien ?
This series is the best I have ever seen. Hooked. You MYUST start at the beginning......you will not be dissapointed!

Judging a series such as Downton Abbey is all about one's taste. Its popularity indicates a lot of people share the enthusiasm my wife and I have for the program. No doubt there are those who disagree. If you have not watched it, I recommend you start with the first season and watch multiple episodes before making a decision. If you still don't like it, it's not for you. Meanwhile my wife and I and many many others cannot wait for the next season.
The  best t.v.  show in a long time.  I love that I can purchase on Amazon  and watch anytime I want.
I love every episode of this show, Maggie Smith is at her best. I recommend this show to all my friends and family.

LOVE, love love the show. It is always a treat to watch and this season it is about what Lady Mary will do after losing her husband at the end of last season. Loved the new characters but was a bit miffed that the last show of this season felt a bit off. But still a definite must watch.

I love the Masterpiece series.  I have watched all four seasons on TV. Here in lies the problem.  Soooo when I wanted to purchase for my husband (he had not seen any) and I to watch, boy was I disappointed!!!!! Many, many  parts have been cut out of all the seasons including number 4.  How do I go about getting the real deal????
Love Downton Abbey and sure like the fact that my husband and I can watch it any time we want to.  Highly recommend.
This movie is fantastic! The careful details, the excellent dialogues and performances are among the best produced either by TV or Movie theaters. I'm looking forward to the next season!
We enjoyed watching the episodes and the purchase was a wise choice.  It shipped quickly and we are very happy with it.

I'm a Downto fan!! I love the use of the English language. The costumes are fabulous the acting superb in most cases.
I was disappointed to have the season end so soon.
I wish they would include a few more episodes .
I watch the episodes again on Amazon and see subtle satire and humor I might have missed before.
There is a certain elegance in demeanor that we all would do well to employ more of .
Well done!
I just wish that there were more than 9 episodes to season four. We are waiting for more. The acting is great.
A Good story continues. A interesting part of history and an era gone by. The acting and setting and story are very good. I liked previous seasons better but this still is worth seeing.
My wife & I got hooked on the Downton Abbey Series-  we have all 4 seasons & are waiting fo the 5th & possibly 6th season  season to come out.
Well written, well acted, interesting characters and lifestyle; along with the British dry wit; how can you go wrong? And it is all done without vulgarities. Amazing, isn't it?  A must see!

We really enjoy this show a lot !  We were late comers to the show, so we caught up by buying previous seasons.not wanting to miss anything.  I would highly recommend this show.  We will be looking forward to season 5 !!!
Love the series of Downton Abbey and received the DVD in plenty of time to view it with family and friends
Love love love " the Abbey". For readers and viewers who love historical reference this is " a mantra". Can't wait till the next season comes out

Season 4 was another amazing "Masterpiece" to watch with the great actors portraying incredible characters.  Julian Fellowes does a great job in writing the series and bring to life in a TV series.  Cannot wait for Season 5 to see what surprises are in store for the viewers.

I am completely hooked on this series.  I heard a QVC host talking about it so I watched season 1 on prime instant from
there I quickly became enthralled with the series.  Can't wait for season 5.

I got a late start watching Downton Abbey, but I ended up view all of them.  Season 4 was good to tie up a lot of loose ends and see the progress of growth in society as well as the individual characters.  Bob's Girl
Loved the plotline with Anna, it was so heartbreaking and well-acted, Mary's new suitors are are more interesting compared to the first season

Couldn't wait for it's arrival! I have Season 1, 2, & 3. I'm addicted, and I wasn't disappointed. I had pre-ordered. I love the series, the cast and the writing. My only regret, was Matthew got killed off, but the others picked right up, and carried on.

It's okay not up to par like the first three seasons or maybe some of the luster left with the death of Matthew. Please do something about Thomas, he is abominable. Also, can Anna and  Mr. Bates have more scenes?
Awesome series this was one of the best I've ever seen.  Can't wait until Season 5 comes out and hope there are several more after that.
Love the English accents and costumes! Sometimes I have to rewind because I don't understand what they've said.  They are all so proper!
Can't say enough about Downton Abbey. Love the series from the very beginning. Superb writing with outstanding actors especially the great Maggie Smith. She is the scene stealer!

As usual the 4th Season of Downton was as good as all the others.
It's hard to wait for another season.  One of the best Masterpiece productions I've watched.
The usual excellent quality I expected. Wonderful series. I highly recommend this series for adults. It is a bit realistic for children.
So happy to have the DVD in blu ray!  Great program that the whole family is hooked on.  Looking forward to more seasons!
My favorite TV show. Seasons aren't long enough. These story line is great as are the characters. Can hardy wait for a new season.
I just love this show!  The drama and characters are enthralling with multiple plot lines to keep your interest.  I can't wait for next season!

I enjoy every minute of this series.  The characters are getting to be like family even the ones I dislike.  Maggie Smith is my very best favorite.  It is fun to see what's going on upstairs and below the stairs.  Can't  wait for the next season.
Great service. Great fun. Downton continues to be the classiest television series of all, and this season reinforces that point.
Its the storyline that makes it. If you do not have any interest in that timeline then do not buy. the medium that it is printed on is totally satisfactory.
Season 4 is absolutely wonderful.  I have the whole series now with this latest season of Downton Abbey.  Add it to your library.

Like many series, the 3rd is usually slumpy and that was the case until the end.  But I found this fourth season was weak, not as tightly driven in any direction.  It was still better than most anything out there, just didn't compare to the first 2 season.s

I love Downton Abbey and wanted to add to my library.
I have the previous DVD and want to complete it.
fabulous! Can't wait for season 5!  The scenery and costumes are magnificent and the acting is superb! A true marvel on PBS.
It's always good.  I love each characters development.  I much appreciate that the incident with Anna didn't go on for too many episodes.
Love the continued character development, especially with some of the smaller roles.  Plus no one died horribly during the season finale.
I absolutely love this series - can't wait for the new season -- wish it was tomorrow!!  I rave about this series to everyone.

Downton Abbey is addictive.  But like so many addictive things, it's the first bite that tastes the best.  I'm still very much enjoying it, but the THRILL is gone (oh, except for Dame Maggie - she's still a surprise and delight every time).
Can't wait for the next season.  I watched all four seasons in three weeks and now am having withdrawal fro the show.
The same excellent standard have prevailed. this season is a tribute to Julian Fellowes  .  I thoroughly enjoyed this Season.
My favorite show.  Wish it had more episodes.  Please stop killing my favorite characters. This is the only program I buy the DVD's
I really wasn't sure if I would like the season, after Matthew dying, but I was very pleased with the various story lines.
I so enjoy watching Downton Abbey...takes me back to my English heritage. Well done! Looking forward to Season 5 already!

With that said they disc are in great shape. Also the little extra content in most episodes as enjoyed by my wife. I watch them with her because she asked me to. It is not my favorite show by far (I am more of a scifi/fantasy series guy.. think Firefly) but she really enjoyed this disc set.
Was waiting with anticipation to find out what Season 4 would bring.  As usual, good quality and fast service. Thanks, Amazon!

This is just one of the best stories I have ever seen, absolutely hooked on Downton Abby.  The characters immediately draw you in to their world, two separate but connected worlds, the upper class and the servants who work for them.  Great story lines. I had just started watching during the  4th season, and was immediately hooked and had to have the 1st three seasons.  Just amazing writing!! This definitely needs to be added to your library of awesome classics!
Anything with Dame Maggie Smith is always worth wat hint.  Wonderful writing and great actors.  Scenery attention to detail all marvelous!!
Each episode is better than the previous.  I may buy the whole thing and watch over and over!  It's hard to imagine that the 'upper class' lived in homes like that and never had to dust!
One of the best shows I've ever watched.  The acting is superior. I can hardly wait for the next season.
Great stories and wonderful actors. and the settings are very good and true to the times in which they are set.
I watch all of the DVD's, all 4 seasons, and am looking forward to Season 5.  Its historical, romantic, tragic, sentimental, treachery, all the ingredients you need for a good STORY.

Loved every thing about it. Could not wait for the  next part to come. Got hooked. I would recommend this to anyone. I suppose women because it being soap opera like, but better. Really loved Maggie Smith, she was really great. Waited to see what she would say next. A+
I love this series! Period dramas are my thing. I got a guy from work into watching it, and he is more of a zombie apocalypse fan. :)

A truly enjoyable series without being offensive in any way.  I love all the characters and am looking forward to Season 5. It would be wonderful if we had more of this type of programming without the need for violence or profanity.  It has a story to be told and is done in such a way that one looks forward to the next week's program. I highly recommend this.
A simpler time......wish we could go back.  It is so well done.  I never lived a life so simple and easy.
I have all 4 seasons on DVD.  The extra sections are all very interesting but season 4 was the best.
disappointed frankly that these were the exact shows aired on PBS. On Netflix they have the uncut BBC originals. Don't waste your money-watch them free on PBS
absolutely hooked on Downtown Abbey.  wish it didn't end after 6 weeks.  Can't wait till next season to come  am so ready
Can't wait for the next season.  The characters are interesting.  You get hooked on this one right away and hate to miss a single week.
Love this series. You will be hooked if you watch the first episode. I heard about Downtown Abby on the news and thought what the hey. So good. I am on the fourth season.

What is there to say about this that hundreds of people haven't already said?  I simply love Downton Abbey and everything about it...each season gets better than the next. By it and watch it over and over and over as I have...you won't be sorry.
Love the history, love the intricate story lines, love the witty and smart writing, and love the excellent acting and directing!  Love, love, love this show!
I hope there's another season coming, because I am thoroughly hooked on Downton Abbey.  Great cast, great costumes--A plus !

Anyone that has fallen in love with this series as much as I have...then you will love season 4 too. Of course there are the up's and down's of life weaved throughout the episodes. To me, that is what brings the reality of that era, of life, and it is a part of the reason why I love it dearly. It captivates and sweeps me away, and I look forward to season 5 with great anticipation.

Amazing series....am looking forward to Season 5....and more adventures of the Crawley Family....What I like most is that they resolve issues quickly....and never leave us hanging as a lot of series do....not to mention that the acting is superb....all in all a great series...
Well written, superbly acted and intriguing. I'm a confirmed Abbey addict looking forward to Season 5. Best mini-series developed for television in a long time, in my opinion.

When we had to say "goodbye" to Matthew in season 3, I was doubting that I could be won back in season 4.  But Downton succeeded in winning me back.  The characters are always interesting and there are always unexpected twists.
Love the series and can't wait for season 5. However, the second disc of my DVDs skipped a lot. Not happy with that. But disc 1 & 3 played perfectly
I've now watched all 4 series and can't wait until it starts up again. I never watched it on TV but have purchased every season from Amazon and enjoyed it immensely.
So much fun to watch a reenactment of a period in time when people had manners (even the "lower class" servants). If we could bring such civility to this millennium, wouldn't it be jolly!

It's great fun to be able to follow the Grantham community as they deal with the changes brought on by WWI and the twentieth century. History plus family affairs - some of which we can identify, some we just have to be  amazed.
Great story.  Can't wait for Season 5.  Love the characters.  Am excited to watch what will happen next.  I would highly recommend watching.
This is a great  PBS series. I would reccomend this to a more adult group of individuals. Cant wait for the next season.
How do you describe perfection? Interesting story. Interesting characters. Perfect surroundings. Great actors!!! Looking forward to next season. Hope it goes  on for a long time.

thank goodness, I didn't realized I had missed a show until the season was over and things had happend that I didn't see solved.

well I looked it up and found I had missed one and streamed it right then and there to my computer.

now I know what happened. and I'm ready for next season
amazing series, I am glad I bought 4 , Can't wait for 5 to come out at the end of this year
Love the series and can not wait for season Five to begin! This series is well worth watching more than once.

Everyone was telling me to watch Downton Abbey so I got Amazon Prime and watch all 4 seasons and am anxiously awaiting the 5th season.  It is a terrific show and very enjoyable to watch. It is a clean cut show for the most part and has very interesting characters.
Not as fabulous as the previous seasons but still great to enjoy. I can't wait for the next season to see them going on with their lives and tribulations.

Love Downton great to watch can't wait for season 5 the characters get better and better I hope they come out with the next season soon I enjoy watching  each character come alive on screen I hope they come out with season 5 soon
when I watch my mouth is open in awe, the actors play their character with so much ease.  I just want to see more 7 episodes a year is not enough
I'm a huge Downton Abbey fan.  What else can I say?  This season did not disappoint.  I really liked the Christmas Special episode.  The change of setting was perfect.
Excellent character development, plot lines, and an incredible cast .  It's simply outstanding!  Required watching for anyone with a brain.
Very grateful!  My wife and I have just finished season 4, and eagerly anticipate the upcoming season of Downton Abbey!
Excellent series set in the English countryside in the early 1920's. It shows the social and economic challenges of that time.
Who doesn't love Downton Abbey?  I am now sharing it with my family and friends to enjoy too. But, start at the beginning and enjoy the development of the characters to Season 4.
I love this program and to be able to sit and re-watch episodes is a luxury for me.  It arrived in a very timely fashion and am very pleased with the product and services!
I love Downton abbey!! I own all 4 seasons ! I watch them all the time! Best program on TV, every Sunday night is devoted to Doenton!
BBC has a fantastic series. it's the best story on TV. I only wish they'd do more episodes each year.
One of the best series ever I cannot wait for next season, this one seemed rather short but loved it.
Love this show.  So glad I started watching.  Can't wait for Season 5 to start & see what happens next!

I am an avid Downton fan and like most awaited season 4 with great anticipation.  I was disappointed. The entire season was anti-climatic.  Anna's assault, forbidden love, missing Michael and what Bates may or may not have done did not leave me with the usual excitement of the abbey. Having said that, I still await season 5 in hope it will correct itself.

I couldn't be more pleased with this show. And even though it is on its fourth season, I don't think the show is coming to an end anytime soon! The charecters and plot are wonderful! I love that the season finale leads you into the next season.
can't wait for season 5 to see how the story continues, we've watched all 4 seasons within a month, and that's the way to do it.
once again, Downton Abbey, had an exciting season! can not wait for Season 5... Love this show a must see for anyone who finds this era entertaining!
Really beautifully done! Can't wait for season 5! Waiting for something good to happen to Lady Edyth and her daughter!
Like many people I know, I love this show! The plot is complicated enough that it is fun to watch it more than once.
Absolutely an intriguing series.  The story, the costumes, the scenery are wonderful.  Children and men can also really enjoy it.
I am like so many others who have fallen in love with Julian Fellows characters and story. I own the complete series so far and have loaned them to friends. They love it too!
Love it! Love it! Love it!. I makes me cry though. Totally addicting, it a must watch show. great story, costumes, set, etc!!!!!
Have not watched this season 4 yet but based on the previous seasons, I know it won't disappoint.  I much prefer to watch it at my convenience  on DVD rather than on the network television.

Very entertaining season. I really enjoy the audio quality on these DVDs. Compared to Seasons 1-6 of Foyle's War DVDs, its like having the actors in your living room as opposed to the show sounding like it is broadcast on an old Victrola!
Looking forward to Season 5!

Loved season 4 of Downton Abbey.  Different characters introduced. Interesting to see how places like Downton have to change with the times and how they don't want to do it but have to if they want to survive.  As always, there's a tragedy and plot twists that will keep you coming back (as if we would need a reason).........Lady Violet is in rare form and we got to see more of Cora's family from America.  Loved the way it ended.  Can't wait for season 5.

Fabulous!  The costumes, the settings, the story, the characters; all are just grand.  But the most grand of all:  Maggie Smith.  Her performance, great lines and attitude are the pinnacle of Downton Abbey!
I'm enjoying the overall story; did not care for some of the plot twists in this season.  Hope the plot line improves next season.

This is a great engaging series. I am not sure what the difference is between the UK version and the US version. We had previously had the US version and this continued the series seamlessly. It is nice to be able to find out what happens quickly.

If you've enjoyed the first three seasons the fourth will not disappoint. In fact if you were somewhat "mad" at the ending of season three you will find season four redeeming the series that we all love. This season not only has Lady Mary showing us another aspect of herself, it throughs us a Lady Edith worth cheering for.  I am anxiously anticipating season five and how this seasons intrigues are settled.
I am waiting for the next season.  We (my husband and I) made a nightly ritual of watching Downton during our dinner.  It is simply superbly done.
I agree with all other positive comments on this product. It's a great show and this is a joy DVD to own. Kudos to all parts of the production, a really entertaining drama to watch.
Here, here!  The saga continues to delight in every way.  You truly love the characters, and their way of life.  I'm sure that the best is yet to come.
is a great  movie. a great addition to my library. have enjoyed it already. i wish i had seen it in the theater

Never a dull moment. Each episode leaves your wanting more. Season 5 can't come quick enough and hopefully they can have 6,7, and on even though I know it can last for ever. This show has the makings of a record setting series. It's one I'll remember for a long time.
Who would not want a copy of the DVD if you enjoy the show?  Even though PBS will show it again before next season, I enjoy watching it during the summer when nothing else is on.
I love having this collection at my fingertips and have shared it with friends. Watching this uninterrupted by commercials is awesome and I have the liberty of doing the one day "marathon"!
My life is crazy about the series and I bought it for her. So the rating reflects the Mrs.' opinion of this latest UK hit soap opera series.

I have not received season 4 yet, but I am watching 1-3 seasons.  Finished season 1 and 2 and this is the best series for your money. I can not wait to finsh 1-3 am looking forward to season 4 then can not wait till season 5 begins.  The BEST series ever.
I love the show Downton Abbey and even though I watch it on PBS, I like have my own copy to go back and watch it again
Best show on TV.  Very classy, good storyline.  Good clean drama without violence, lewd language and over the top sex scenes.  Love it!
I love this show.  It is one of my favorites.  I even got my husband hooked on it.  He normally watches wild west and shooting.
I LOVED all of Season 4! When is Season 5 coming out??? I can't wait! So many possibilities yet to come!
Just love this series. We've watched it on TV and have bought all the seasons to watch again and again. Such a masterpiece: great acting and writing, scenery, clothes. Love it!
The storyline became indecent. There were too many characters involved, the conclusion was indecisive. The incident with Anna  was prolonged too long which was not necessary.
We were very satisfied with the DVD. This is truly quality programming. Would recommend it highly. It keeps you coming back for more.
Throughly enjoyed watching this series  Story line very suspenseful and entertaining.  The cast was well chosen and believable. Iwould recommend this to young adults.
I am not usually hooked on English soap opera type shows, but this show rocks! It is my favorite and this particular season is great!
Love this drama and I hope they never stop making this show.  Hope to see the children grow up too.
Already have the first 3 seasons so of course had to have #4.  I love this series & watch it over & over.  Thanks so much!
Just love this show. I can't wait for Season 5. I purchased previous seasons as well. Definitely worth the cost.
The show was fantastic. I love these characters. However the video quality was average. There were quite a bit of interruptions.
You don't have to be a fan of British history to love the storyline. Season one draws you in and the rest keep you there! Such a great  story. I cant wait for season 5!!
After the death of Mary's husband, Matthew, Mary's relationship with suitors was handled well.  I enjoyed how Edith was brought more into the story line.  I am truly looking forward to Season 5.  :)
Excellent continuation of a fine series. And this DVD did work in my player, unlike my other DVD purchase in the order.
Never fails to satisfy. Great attention to period detail, excellent writing, and first-rate acting. Downton Abbey could keep American audiences happy for years.
The acting is amazing,costumes and hairstyles are brilliant and the scenery of England is gorgeous and story lines of characters keep you on edge.
Just a fabulously well done saga.  I like everything about it:  acting, plot, direction, sets, everything.  I think it's a great show!

Fine characters, fair stories,and very good production keep DA going this year but  the writers seem to be running out of fresh storylines. perhaps at the end of this season it should fade to credits rather than die in another season.

Captivating, gets you caught up in the life of the characters right from  the start.  The stories of each person makes you hope their lives gets better, makes you hope their dreams and needs happen for them all.great writing,. Makes you want to see what happens next. The history of this lavish old home, the lifestyle  they all live, from the owner families down to the servants, makes you feel as you know them all personally..LOVE IT!!!!
I have purchased every season since each one came out.  Love this series!  CD's arrived as expected, and in good shape.

This season picked up where it left off last year. Each episode puts me right inside the family and I feel like I am a part of this family. I have to say that my favorite character is Maggie Smith. She always puts a smile on my face.

If you love history, are a bit of a nerd-introvert and are a closet soap opera fan, then this series is for you.  Even those who opt out of the soap opera scene enjoy this series, so if you have two of the three requirements you are guaranteed to enjoy it.  The acting is superb, the costumes ideal down to the last thread and the cinematography a soothing balm for the eyes.

We love this show.  We watched the last of season 4 and then went back and ordered all of the other shows.  We watched them while eating our lunch.  Humor, drama, and a world so well filled out you feel like you are a part of it all.  It had us looking up historical facts and learning while we were thoroughly entertained.
It is so well written and all the lots intertwined are so suspenseful.  I can't wait to see what happens next.  I think Tom should go to America but don't want to lose his character on the show

What can I say that hasn't been said?  It's the best series I've ever seen and I've been around before TV was invented.  Even if you are not a history buff, as I am, you will love the settings and performances of the characters.  You will love some and hate others, but you will always be engrossed and eagerly awaiting the next episode.  Warning, don't start watching unless your calendar is cleared for the weekend, because once you start, it is very hard to stop.
I very much enjoyed this series and hope there will be Season 5. It was one of the best adventures.
Perfect, completes my video collection for Downton Abbey series.  I am sure I will watch this over and over again.

After the drama which ended season 3, I was skeptical that season 4 would be able to live up to the story line.  Wow- just when you think the show may be running out of script ideas, it twists and turns and pulls you in!  Definitely would recommend this for DA fans.

I was quickly hooked on this series and did not hesitate to purchase Season 4 after watching the other 3 seasons on Amazon Prime for free.  Season 3 was by far my favorite, but Season 4 was great as well!
This is such a well done series. The acting is great and it really gives a glimpse into the world of the aristocracy.
I wanted the story to keep going on.  There is so much happening, and you get very involved with the characters...either loving or hating them!  I can't wait until the next season.
Of course Downton deserves 5 stars! I once thought it silly, but after watching season 1 on Netflix, I had to buy the rest on Amazon instant video. Hopelessly hooked. Love all of it!

It is an all captivating and nonstop adventure. The characters are fully developed and constantly true to part. A bygone era meticulously depicted allows one to visit an elegant time period. It is an intelligent show full of period memorabilia adding to a charm totally lost today. The acting is superb. The areas used for filming are breathtaking in opulence, meticulous in every detail of life as it was in various segments of society in that part of the world.
Foremost it is refreshingly British. This is a show which will not compromise its quest for movie making perfection in our time when computer generated images are a norm and "Good enough" IS good enough.
A MUST ADD HERE:
After three thousand five stars l had to go check on why oh why, one hundred reviewers gave it one star. As l thought, negative opinions must surface, especially when faced with overwhelming positives. The thing here which is hilarious is, all these reviewers with one star who claim to have wished a character had remained or another had...whatever, the point? ....the point, they all had to watch it throughout first. Gotta love those Naysayers.

The cast is outstanding!
The production, the lines, in fact, EVERYTHING!!!
It is utterly marvelous!! No comparison!
You will not be disappointed..
LOVED every min of it.  As always will buy blue ray again for this series it is so pretty it deserves the best resolution
This is one of the best written, acted and produced PBS shows (or for the matter any show) I have ever seen. I love.

After the great success of the early seasons, one might expect the script writers to run out of ideas of be forced to re-hash some old themes, but not so! This series continues to turn in ways you can't foresee, with new characters and unexpected plot twists, keeping the viewer engaged and in a can't-wait-for-the-next-episode thirst for more. The upstairs and below-stairs characters are now so familiar as to be more like family, and one can't help but feel compassion for them in their respective situations.  Roll on Season 5!

P.S. The original order shipment of this series never arrived, but Amazon.com expedited a second copy, with no questions asked. That's true customer service!
If your a Downton fan you need to own the entire collection. So fun to watch again and again. Plus catch up on all the quips you misses the first time. A must have!

This PBS series draws on life and the changes that occur within a very wealthy family at a crucial time in history. What great family dynamics and action throughout the entire series. Just loved all characters and the excellent acting by all. Settings were amazing and the beautiful countryside was wonderful.
We had already seen Season 1-3. Season 4 was wonderful.  We can't wait for next year and we would be glad if it went on for more seasons.
A typical and superlative series.  The British always do such great work. Their period pieces are rich and steeped in history.

great show and great service.....thank you

its such a wonderful group of actors and story tellers ........well done and can't wait for season 5

julie graham
Australia
Having a hard time that all the characters keep getting killed off, but absolutely love the show.  It's totally addictive.

I love this series and each season just gets better and better. Storylines are strong and performances top rate.  My only problem was that in my haste to get season 4 I didn't get Australian edition and so had to watch on a small portable player as this one was the UK format.  Still played well just not on my main television.  I'll be more careful next time.
This series is just well done. I liked the first couple of seasons better so this is only going to get 4 stars out of me. That being said I love watching this show and am always hungry for more!
But is part of the continuing story of the residents of Downton Abbey.  I'm waiting for season five and hope that it is better than the short 4th season.  Love it.

I recomend Downton Abby 4 for all that have followed the series from the begining through 1,2,3, & now 4. I like it very much it had just the right amount of everything this storyline brings into your livingroom. I felt like I was sitting right there in the mist of their conversations, dramas, etc.

It's amazing how success drives good writing!  So many threads to follow and lots of beautiful people to love or hate. Season 4 was a good recovery from a big disappointment in Season 3.  This will likely be another "Upstairs, Downstairs".
cant wait for next season, this season not as good as season 3 but will definitely  continue to watch definitely
The last dvd snapped in half and broke while I was taking it out of the case.  Never have I had that happen before with a dvd.  Highly upsetting!!
Anyone who has seen the show would find it interesting to pay attention to become immersed in the continuing story.
You will get hooked in one episode of this series.  It has a great cast and the dialog is fantastic.  I love it.  Would recommend and have.
great story line. The costumes, the scenery and the actors are wonderful.  I do wish the writers would stop killing characters we love!

Do not miss this season.  It is the best I think of the four seasons.  Cannot wait for season five to start.  The best thing is you can sit down and watch it iver and over again to pick up on the parts you missed.
I love this show!!! There are never enough episodes and it never feels long enough! I can't wait for the next season!
I enjoyed this season, but not as much as the previous 3 seasons. I would recommend to anyone that has seen the previous seasons but it has lost some of its luster.

I am wondering if I missed some episodes, i did not see Mary's proposal, or  wedding, or the part where her husband was killed.  I watched them on Amazon Prime, did the regular seasons include episodes that were not included in Prime?
Love the series.  Benedict Cumberbatch is wonderful as Sherlock. This was part of the best birthday gift I have ever given.

We saw a show on 60 minutes I think about the real royalty and everyones fascination with them since this series, I was curious what the hype was all about.  I watched a few episodes on the plane, and was HOOKED.  Warning, it is my husband and my favorite.  Can't wait til next season.  Enjoy
Downton Abbey is probably one of the best series I have ever watched.  It is fast paced, involves the lives of many characters and twines the all together superbly.

This series just keeps on giving more and more great seasons.  Many shows go stale after the first couple of seasons, but not this one.

:-Donna
so glad to be able to watch the DVD.  The whole series is the best show on TV.  I cant wait for season 5.
Merchandise delivered in good shape and 4th season was quite good; all tolled, it is a very good and rewarding investment.
A little disappointing.  It was too short of a season and the actors didn't seem to have their heart into it like other seasons.  Hope they are not getting burned out.

Have been hooked since the beginning!  Not sure why the story is taking certain directions, but it keeps me coming back for more!  Ready for some happier times and to see how children fit into the story.  I sincerely hope that the producers can keep this series interesting for some time to come.  I enjoy the scenery and the reference to historical facts along the way.
Have all 4 seasons now, but am procrastinating watching season 4 because then it will be over!  Love this show!

Best season so far & all the stories were addressed in the conclusion. Beautifully acted as always by all, Downton Abbey always pulls me in so that I care so much, The characters inhabit my thoughts & feelings even when I'm not watching.
Season 4 has kept up the quality of the acting and writing.  We had DVD for the first 3 seasons and watching on prime is only a small drop off in clarity.  We will keep on watching.

Without a doubt one of my favorite series on TV!  My only wish is that we didn't have to wait until next Jan for the next season!  Also wish there were more shows per season!  Top notch cast with excellent story lines!  Bravo to all involved as there is not much on TV these days that can compare!

We love the series and we are sad when the season ends. Between the storylines, the beautiful English scenery, it takes you back in time and shows you what is was like.  Just a wonderful series. We are hooked.
Great characters.  Just when you think you know what they  are about, they surprise you.  Well written.  A pleasure to watch.
Great as Always. I am looking forward to the continues story. The characters are interesting and the historical setting beautiful.
Try it. But start with season 1 if  you can. I doubt things were really like this, but I don't care. It's a world I want to get lost in.
did this years downton  seems shorter than the years before.  love how the story line progressed, just wish it was longer.
I missed the series on TV and was happy to watch it online.  Not the best of their seasons yet an excellent show.  Each season brings such a history and fashion piece along with it.
Have loved Downton Abbey from the first season, this season is less dramatic but does have a very sweet ending.
Condition of movie and delivery was great, would like to be notified as soon as the next season is available on DVD, will order it in a heart beat.
I enjoyed viewing Downton Abbey Season 4.  I enjoyed the story line, the historical reference and the authentic costumes and scenery.
...and it just keeps getting better!  Characters are great, interesting twists, new plot lines and so in keeping with changing times within the period.

Love the series. I wish it would go on like the old Upstairs/Downstairs series did. You really get to like/dislike these people. If you are a person that buys movies this is a series that you will watch over and over. Love it.
I really enjoy watching this show but seem to always miss it on air. However, I was a little disappointed they killed off Mathew.
I love period shows as it give us a glimpse of time past.  The upstairs downstairs element is fascinating. I hope they continue the show on and on...

Beautifully done and another great episode in the ongoing story.  A lot packed into Season 4 and, of course, we're now looking forward to Season 5!  Thank you, Sir Julian, for the many happy hours you and this marvelous cast have brought us!
Can never wait for the end of the season, so very thankful that Amazon always offers the series early.  Thank you so very much.
I found myself cancelling plans and staying in all weekend to watch this season. I couldn't peel myself away! I am a new fan, but definitely hooked now!
Downton Abbey has such excellence in subject and casting that it ruins every other show or movie on Television today.
Well acted and a great story about what was going on at the time in this place in history.  Would recommend this to everyone!

I love this story.  I was given the first season and decided to purchase all seasons.
I had not seen any of the shows so I spent a few days watching all of them.  I am so glad
that i was given the first season and could enjoy the rest of the seasons.
What can you say.  Classic.  If you miss this series you are missing out big time.  What is good, what is true, what is it to live ones beliefs.  Check it out.
The drama continues.  What is lurking around the corner either upstairs or downstairs.  Every episode tends to end in a cliffhanger.
Season 4 was just great can hardly wait for the next one there was a problem with the last disc Amazon was amazing in replacing the whole thing within 48 hours.
I love Downton Abby- I couldn't wait to see it on tv so I bought season 4 and watched it straight thru. Great show
Excellent dialogue. Great acting Good and believable storyline.  Great set up for season five and having fun talking about what might be. It is entertainment and it is entertaining

Last episode was good, not great, but good. And thankfully no surprise departures!
The unexpected ending event that foreshadows next season is very nice.
Characters are very enjoyable,  setting and time period are great too.  Witty dialogue especially with Maggie Smith one of the stars...
Love the actors and actresses, great storyline.  Makes you want to,continue watching.  Looking forward to Season 5.  Nothing more to say.
Absolutely brilliant, I watch over and over, inspired my to visit the set.

If you are considering this set, you already know that the story is wonderful, the acting first-rate, and the production magnificent. It only remains to review the discs. They do not disappoint. The image and sound are excellent. In addition to the episodes, there are some very nice specials, giving a chance to the actors, directors and producers to give us further viewpoints on what it is like to be involved in such a significant production. I am delighted with the whole set!
Usually I can guess what's going to happen with most shows DA keeps on supplying surprises and suspense. Always beautiful

Who knew that I could get so engrossed in a TV show like this!  I watched season after season in quick order on Roku and loved ever session.  Such a peek into life in the servants quarters, the styles worn (beautiful dresses),  and the code of honor (or not).  Fantastic series.
Great series just love it couldn't wait for it to be on TV in Australia. You don't get the complete show on TV they cut so much.

I had not seen any episodes of "Downton Abbey" until a friend lent me Seasons ! & 2.  My daughter and I binge watched both seasons.  When we finished I went right to the computer to purchase Seasons 3 & 4 (which we also binge watched).  Highly recommend this series to everyone.  Loved it.
I love all things Downton Abbey and season 4 did not disappoint.  The episodes need to go on longer!  Cannot wait for season 5 and the further development of story lines and characters.

This is a wonderful series and has a lot of drama, comedic moments and good plots -- and some continuing through the whole season. We have thoroughly enjoyed these series and have to say that if it wasn't for our daughter telling us about it we probably would have missed the first and possible the 2nd years.
A wonderful story about a royal family as it transitions to "modern" times as societal history hangs on to traditional ways. Wonderful upstairs/downstairs -- double stories go on as the progress continues with social changes until . . .
Guess you will just have to enjoy it yourselves by getting this latest "masterpiece" for the series.
The script is great, the characters are great, and the acting is too. I hope nothing bad happens to Ana and  Mr. Bates, I really want them to be happy.
Loved the DVD but the first one Disc 3 was broken and didn't discover it until we went to play it.  Had to reorder Season 4 DVD.
I was hesitant to get involved with DA but I saw one episode with my mother and was hooked! Had to watch the whole series!
This show is so well written and the story lines are well conceived.  We look forward to every show!  Can`t hardly wait for the new season.

My favorite program but not enough episodes.kept thinking I must have missed something so kept looking for the missing episodes only to find out it was only eight . To popular programming to only give use barely a story from it. Disappointing. Need more of it to call it a season.
I am absolutely hooked on this series and after viewing this season so is my son. We can hardly wait for season 5.
The writing on this show is the best. The characters are vivid and imaginative. I love every episode of every season.
I have thoroughly enjoyed this series.  Would not have been satisfied if I hadn't seen how it ends.  Although still haven't quite finished it.

I pre-ordered this and couldn't wait for it to arrive.  Because of the significant delay before the DVD actually starts to play, I thought I had received a bad issue and sent it back to Amazon.  Amazon sent me another and since I was busy doing something else when I slipped the DVD into my recorder I didn't notice how long the delay was.  It is a good minute or two before it starts to play.
Best show. Great acting. Intriguing storyline. Anxious for next season. Can watch over and over again and catch new insights into story.
Characters you love or hate. The intrigue of 20th century English class distinction and social revolution.  Yeah, I know, it's a soap.
Great drama. Can't wait for Season 5! My favorite character is the Dowager Countess. So intriguing. But all of the characters are endearing in some way.
This is a terrific period piece. I think it will age well and be the type of show you will watch again. I bought this set because I could not wait to watch it on PBS.
This series continues its exceptional run. My wife and I finished the whole year in 4 nights. The HD version of the DVD is terrific.
For whatever reason, I have not been able to view my purchase of the episode.  Please fix this problem or refund my money.

It is the best series that I have ever watched.  The actors and actresses are superb.  I love the Old ideas about the rich and the servants that take care of them.  It's very interesting how it all changes as time goes on.  I hope there are many more seasons coming in the near future.
This series is so well written and the cast is amazing.  I love this series it's one of the best TV series out now!
I enjoy watching this show, especially the attention to details for historical accuracy.  I would have prefured it it was a little less of a melowdrama.
One of the best series ever! Casting is brilliant. Costuming and props deliciously detailed. And the story lines: dramatically  superb!

I admit it, I'm a Downton Abbey junkie.  I surprised even myself.  I used to kid my late wife when she would get involved with the TV soap operas, and although it isn't labeled as one, I can't see a lot of difference, except for the production values.  And I guess at heart I'm an Anglophile.

Love the setting and plot development. I also love the link to history and fashions. Well done, Brits!
You have raised the bar in television drama and we Americans have much to learn from you,

I so love Downton! My husband and I watch it over and over again. Sometimes you catch little things you missed watching it the first time. The clothing is awesome and all of the actors are fabulous.  You can never have enough Downton.
The quality of the picture was disappointing.  Love the series so we will only be ordering Blu-Ray versions in the future.

Downton Abbey is British TV at its finest: excellent acting and story line that is both entertaining and meaningful. The interaction between the English aristocrats and those of the lives of dutiful servants kept my interest and I look forward to the next season in production. Five stars is adequate for Downton Abbey--a refreshing series of entertainment that I can easily recommend.
So captivating, love the acting, the story line, love the characters . . . . can't wait for the newest season to start.
Bummer no Matthew, but a good job moving forward and keeping our interest up.  Love the actors, clothing, and beautiful country.
This series has hooked several members of my family, including Dad. The character development is 1st class and the dialogue sublime.
It's wonderful to come back to peek into the richly drawn world of Downton Abbey and meet all those beautifully drawn characters again.
This is a great show. Wonderful characters. I couldn't wait out the weeks until the show finished on television I had to preorder the cd.
We waited with great anticipation as we are unable to get PBS.  We were not disappointed. Cant wait to finish watching.

If you enjoy Pride and Prejudice, Sense and Sensibility, or Gosford Park, you'll love Downton Abbey. Each episode involves a captivating story of events in the Upper class Crawley family and the house staff of butlers, maids and footmen. Highly entertaining.

A real pity to debase what was such a good thing.

My wife loves Downton Abbey. She hopes we will have a Season 5 and 6 and 7 and...........................more and more and more!

What I like most about Downton is that the characters' stories show how the family's lives were firmly interwoven with those of their staff.  Even though The Great War is over, the 1920s were a time of subtle and profound changes for everyone.  In many ways, the staff were far freer to move on to other situations.  This season has many funny moments, especially when the dowager countess is in the scene.
Can't get enough of the Downton gang, and the special features offered a peek into the filming and sets, which was fun.

I simply do not care what any critics have to say - yes, it's rather soapy, contains anachronisms, a shifting cast and abrupt departures - but by god, I just flat out love this series.  There is something compelling about the order and civility of it.  Fellowes has created wonderful characters that you love to love and hate - Thomas...grrrr!

It's a staple of Sunday evening, and one of the few shows that my partner and I agree on completely.  She'd get rid of me before she gave up DA.

So my advice: relax, turn off the critical faculties and enjoy every moment.

The civility of it.  The decency of individuals.  There's no hugging but a touch means the world and a handshake seals the deal.

There is something to be said for  some of the series' old-fashioned virtues; and yes, I understand the underside as regards class, race, gender, and religion (Lord Grantham's reflections on the Catholic faith are delightfully horrid).

But our time could use a bit of the manners on display here.

My wife and I are hooked on all four seasons of Downtown Abbey.  The acting is superb and each character is multifaceted.  We have our favorites and we have our villains.  We have all four seasons on DVDs and watch and re-watch them all.  If this series ever ends, I am sure we'll both go into withdrawal.  We'll probably begin a support group!
Love Downton Abbey!  My husband and I were hooked and watched season 1 through 4 within two weeks.  Highly recommend this series!
What can I say that has not already been said.  This is one of the very best programs every produced for TV.

This is an excellent series that gives an interesting insight into the early 20th century, and not only among the "upper" class but among those less privileged and less affluent. It's far better, in my mind, than Upstairs Downstairs, which was a very fine series. I've read criticism of this fourth season that it's getting stale and needs a new writer, but I don't agree. Julian Fellows has written wonderful dialog (giving Maggie Smith some of his best), and the way he develops his story line is interesting, engaging and convincing. Of course, having superior actors who perform at their best, along with great locations, vehicles and other properties adds a great deal. My wife and I, along with many friends, are among the millions of followers who find this series is just our cup of tea.
Season 4 did not disappoint and offers everything I expected from this series. I love Lady Mary she never fails to make you want to slap some sense into her.

We have enjoyed all of  the seasons through purchases of DVD.  It was a great way to catch up on the prevoius season and a wonderful way to appease our impatience of wanting to view the whole season without waiting fromweek to week.
always looking forward to the next season.  some times it is nice to look back and see what you might have missed

I ordered two dvds of Season 4 and both of them skip through the last 10 minutes of teh last dvd in the series.  Neither I nor the person I bought the second one for watched them until this week and now I cannot return.  How disappointing.  I won't order DVDs on Amazon anymore.

This is a "Masterpiece" in good drama.  I haven't missed an episode on TV and I will watch the DVD many times, I'm sure.  There is so much going on in each episode that one can always pick up something new with each watching.  The characters are amazing and the actors cast are wonderful in those roles.  Thank you for good quality productions.

It's hard for me to be critical of a series that I find enthralling. I enjoy witnessing the public and the private moments of the lives of this extended family and staff.

The acting is superb, consistent and I can't understand how the women have such straight backs.

The permutations of people trying to live lives they can be proud of in a rapidly changing world ae fascinating to me.

Julian Fellows, please don't stop.
great show, too short of a season, wish they made more episodes per season. Good mixture of history and scripted story.
This show has so many depths and layers. I can't wait to find out what happens next! I don't think my boyfriend likes it very much, but I don't really like Breaking Bad either.

I thought that the later seasons would get old, but season four continues to be riveting.

Wonderful acting with a setting that cannot be equaled.

I'm embarrassed at how much I've been enjoying DA these past three seasons. This season was a little "dark" for my taste. The assault on Anna and the emotional aftermath was almost unbearable, and seemed to hang like a pall over the entire series. There were a few too many neat tie-ups at the end also that were not as creative and seamless as I've come to expect through the previous series. Still, Mrs. Hughes' and Cousin Violet's wisdom and large hearts win me over and, as always, save the day. Must say, I'm growing a bit tired of Mary's self-centeredness. This new rivalry between competing beaus is getting quite tedious, and reminiscent of when we first met her and she insisted on holding Matthew at arm's length. Can't she just be nice??

I still give it four stars because the acting is superb and the settings breathtaking. Thanks for the first drama series on PBS I've been unable to turn away from since The Six Wives of Henry VIII.  (When was that - thirty years ago?)
A bit predictable. I did like some of the story lines and was particularly glad that Edith didn't have an abortion.

I realize the importance of introducing more interest to the characters, but the pace of interweaving stories overshadowed the important developments.

I really enjoy this series, but I just don't know why.  The Earl of Grantham (Big Daddy to us grubby colonists) is always wrong and insufferably snobby. The only members with a whit of social conscience is the former IRA terrorist and chauffeur, who only got where he is through marriage.
The downstairs servants feel that they owe their lifelong allegiance to their "Masters", a sensation that I find mind-boggling.  I suppose you have to be from there to grasp that sort of predestination as acceptable - I kept feeling that here in the USA, that lifestyle would last about as  long as it takes to pack up and ease on down the road.
I suppose that you have to take the historical perspective of Castles and serfs, then just say "That's the way it always was."
We here in America grew up with the six-gun culture, and it marks us to this day.  I guess you are what you know.
Having said that, this is a fine series, well acted, well filmed, and I would guess, well crafted of a time in history that is truly British.

Now if Anna and John Bates can just keep their love going after her rape by Lord Gillingham's valet and his death, possibly at the hands of Bates.  Did Mr. Bathes,  really kill Green and, if so, will he actually get away with it?  And on and on it goes with all sorts of other wonderful sub-plots!
