I kinda feel like WWI didn't end for this family - and besides, more losses from the great flu would've been likely....Gee UK - have a little hope for us all...that's why we watch this program anyway. Hope. It would be better if Matthew were really just paralyzed and lived on. Taking him has really taken the air out of my balloon for Downton.
I love this series and can't wait for the next season but since I live in the US I will not have this pleasure until next year sometime.  Can't imagine how Mary will handle the loss.

This is clearly one of the best programs on television.  I just finished watching the complete Season 3 series.  So sorry for the deaths of Sybil and Matthew.  I can't wait until the release of Season 4.

I LOVE this show - it has everything anyone would enjoy viewing - drama, love, suspense, agnst, death. I hate that Matthew was killed and right when he found out he had a son and heir...but since the actor playing him wanted out I understand why they killed him off now.  However, I know it will break my heart to see everyone's reaction - both upstairs and down - how devastating.  I STRONGLY recommend this entire series to everyone. BRAVO PBS!!!

I just love this program.  But, losing Matthew was ABSOLUTELY devastating!  I actually am not sure I want to see Season 4, because of Mary's imminent heartbreak.  If only you could bring Matthew back!  This was the perfect love story and I hate seeing it end with him dying.  I will probably not watch the first installment because of the sadness, and heartbreak, for Mary and her father.  Matthew was the son he always wanted.  He became a brother to Tom.  I hate this.  I am having a hard time dealing with the loss.  EVERYONE loved, and adored, Matthew.  Even the dowager!  Grandma-ma will reel from this.  Please, please, make the sadness short lived and move on to a happy time!
I read that the actor felt his part was stagnant, and wanted to leave. Couldn't Julian Fellows have upped his character?  Oh, well!

i was so exacited about ordering the Dvd season 3. Me and my husband couldn't wait to see it.we were disappointed and shocked about matthew death. I was disappointed and felt that i should be compensated for it. Would season 4 make me forget about Matthew?
Don't blame anyone except the actor who played Matthew; he wanted out of the series, so they had to kill him off.

First Sybil now Matthew!  I mean really......He survived the war, not being able to walk, the death of his fiance' and finally helped to save Downton Abbey as well as finally marrying the woman of his dreams and have her love him back and have a son & heir. I hope they find a way to salvage this, please. I do love this show.

Love the series. Have purchased 1-3.  Hated that Matthew had to be the latest Fellowes victim.  Everything was going so swimmingly with Mary - it just wasn't the right pick!!!  I know the last scene is irrevocable but for heaven sakes, try!!!!

I was so disappointed and upset with the ending.  Poor Matthew, finally with the one woman he loved for so long........and once again Mary must face heartache. Unless Julian changes his mind and brings this kindhearted gentleman back to Mary and to us.  PBS - thanks to you, I have something great in the viewing arena to look forward to each week.

I am so captivated by the story line but hugely disappointed at the unexpected demise of Matthew. It seems as though every series believes they need to end the season with a death. So be it! My only regret is that you chose a character that exemplified the epitome of a gentleman.. Matthew represented, for me, kindness, gallantry and romance. What a pity that he is gone.

Downton Abbey the most magnetic program on television! Grateful that PBS is making it all posssible. As shocking an ending ever,Matthew was so happy, just full of bliss. After the horror and tears and only being able to vision the impact to follow, I have managed to compose myself and WAIT.The entire house will be topsy turvey."If" this is truly to be Matthews end then who will fill the empty arms of Mary and Tom,they are surly not a match but the beautiful young lady from Scotland could be an interest for Tom. She is going to be broke but could mature to bring a match. Each character will be impacted,what will happen in London? What willhappen in the house downstairs? Can not wait for season 4,the intrigue is over whelming!!

Got corralled midway through Season 3 and have now purchased Seasons 1-3.  WOW! What an intriguing series, and Julian Fellowes & Cast have painted an Awesome canvas.  We were breathless at Matthew's early & untimely demise, but I would be obliged to be the "Midwest Cowboy" Lord Grantham had previously suggested Lady Mary should find. Waiting on Season 4 will be like settin' on a powder keg with a short fuse.

Well I had been bashing the writer for the end of season three not realizing it was NOT him who ended that season so badly - the actor left of his own volition. I cannot imagine why someone would leave such a great role in one of the best Masterpiece has to offer. That said I will continue to watch and try to enjoy.  Thank you to the two posters who cleared this up for me. I had thought Fellows had some sort of need to write tragedy .....
Loved Downton Abbey
Yes
the usual, someone has to be sick and dying......but it is all worth it to go back in that era!
Interesting.
good

I am captivated by the characters of Downton Abby. I could imagine myself in many of their situations. I laugh with their joy and cry with their pain. The series is so touching, you almost feel like part of the family.
Loved this Season and all of the seasons.
wife was very favorable with season 4 disk set

I didn't think I would like this show. I thought it would be a boring period piece and not keep my attention, but surprisingly, it is very interesting. You really get attached to each character and the story line is very good. I ordered the whole season.
